config.title: Header Style 16

variables.menu_drop_font: 400 12px/1.35 Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.menu_font: 600 14px/1.35 Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.vermenu_font: 500 12px/1.35 Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif

config.layout_xml:
<body> <!-- Layout --> <referenceContainer name="header.container" htmlClass="page-header header-style-16" /> <referenceContainer name="header-container-inner"> <container name="header-sections" htmlId="header-sections" before="-" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-sections"> <container name="header-top" htmlId="header-top" before="-" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-top"> <container name="header-top-container" htmlClass="container" htmlTag="div"> <container name="header-top-row" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-top-row row"> <container name="header-top-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-12 header-top-left" /> <container name="header-top-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-12 header-top-right" /> </container> </container> </container> <container name="header-middle" htmlId="header-middle" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-middle" /> <container name="header-bottom" htmlId="header-bottom" after="-" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-bottom"> <container name="header-bottom-container" htmlClass="container" htmlTag="div"> <container name="header-bottom-row" htmlClass="row cdz-fix-left" htmlTag="div"> <container name="header-bottom-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-24 header-menu-wrap" /> </container> </container> </container> </container> </referenceContainer>
<referenceContainer name="header.panel"> <container name="header-panel-container" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="container"> <container name="header-panel-row" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-row row"> <container name="header-panel-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-8 header-panel-left" /> <container name="header-panel-center" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-8 header-panel-center" /> <container name="header-panel-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-8 header-panel-right"> <container name="header-panel-right-inner" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-right-inner" /> </container> </container> <container name="header-search-wrap" htmlId="header-search-wrap" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-24 header-search-wrap" /> </container> </referenceContainer> <move element="header.panel" destination="header-middle" /> <!-- End Layout --> <!-- Top --> <referenceContainer name="header-top-left"> <block name="header-extra-text-1" class="Codazon\ThemeLayoutPro\Block\Header" template="Codazon_ThemeLayoutPro::layout/header-content.phtml"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">content_type</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">content_1</argument> </action> </block> </referenceContainer> <referenceContainer name="header-top-right"> <block class="Magento\Store\Block\Switcher" name="header-switch-language" template="Magento_Store::switch/languages-style-02.phtml" /> <block class="Magento\Directory\Block\Currency" name="header-switch-currency" template="Magento_Directory::currency-style-02.phtml" /> <block class="Magento\Store\Block\Switcher" name="header-switch-store" template="switch/stores.phtml"> <arguments> <argument name="id_modifier" xsi:type="string">header-nav</argument> </arguments> </block> </referenceContainer> <!-- End Top -->
<!-- Middle --> <referenceBlock name="header-panel-left"> <block class="Magento\Framework\View\Element\Template" name="links.features.search" template="Magento_Search::search-trigger.phtml" before="-"> <arguments> <argument name="html_class" xsi:type="string">search-link</argument> <argument name="wrapper_tag" xsi:type="string">div</argument> </arguments> </block> </referenceBlock> <move element="utilities.toggle.linkslist" destination="header-panel-left" before="-" /> <move element="header-links-list" destination="utilities.sidebar.left" /> <move element="logo" destination="header-panel-center" /> <move element="top.search" destination="header-search-wrap" /> <move element="mobi-cart-placeholder" destination="header-panel-center" /> <move element="minicart" destination="header-panel-right-inner" after="-" /> <move element="top.links.features" destination="header-panel-right-inner" before="-" /> <referenceBlock name="header-contact-link" remove="true" /> <!-- End Middle -->
<!-- Bottom --> <move element="catalog.topnav" destination="header-bottom-left" before="-" /> <move element="store-menu-placeholder" destination="store.menu" /> <!-- End Bottom -->
<referenceBlock name="utilities.sidebar.right"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">required_blocks</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="array"> <item name="getAccountPanelStyle" xsi:type="string">utilities.content</item> <item name="getHeaderWishlistStyle" xsi:type="string">wishlist-sidebar</item> <item name="getMiniCartStyle" xsi:type="string">minicart-sidebar</item> </argument> </action> </referenceBlock> <referenceBlock name="utilities.sidebar.left"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">required_blocks</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="boolean">0</argument> </action> </referenceBlock>
<referenceBlock name="top.links"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">css_class</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">header links visible-xs</argument> </action> </referenceBlock> </body>
config.content: {"content_1":"<div class=\"header-top-links\"><a class=\"icon-link fa-id-card-o\" href=\"{{store url=\"contact\"}}\">Contact us<\/a> <a class=\"icon-link fa-mobile-phone\" href=\"tel:456 789 123\">+456 789 123<\/a> <a class=\"icon-link fa-envelope-o\" href=\"mailto:codazon@sample.com\">codazon@sample.com<\/a><\/div>","content_2":""}
